The "EQE spectra" refers to the Electro-Optic Characterization System (EQE) spectra, which is a graphical representation of the electro-optic properties of a material. The "Figure 6b" refers to a specific figure in a document or presentation that likely displays the EQE spectra.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
